card.name: export
card.content:
[[Topic+*type+*structure]]
[[analysis blurb]]
[[topic_analysis_blurb]]
[[Analysis+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Analysis+*type+*structure]]
[[Tag]]
[[*css]]
[[Topic+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Company+*type+*structure]]
[[Company+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure]]
[[Cited Claims]]
[[Article]]
[[newClaimJs]]
[[zeroclipboard]]
[[claim clipboard script]]
[[*all+*script]]
[[Analysis+Claim+*type plus right+*structure]]

value.name: Topic+*type+*structure
value.content:
{{+Image|float: left}}
{{+Image source}} {{+About|titled;show:menu}}

Companies connected to {{_|name}}

with articles

{{+Summarized Analyses||content;structure:topic analysis blurb}}

without articles

{{+Unsummarized Analyses||content;structure:topic analysis blurb}}
{{+right sidebar}}

value.name: Analysis+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure
value.content:
[[/new/Claim?_Companies={{_1|name}}&_Topics={{_2|name}}|add a Claim about
{{_1|name}} and {{_2|name}}]]

Other Topics

with Claims about {{_1|link}}

{{_left+other topics||content;structure:topic analysis link and compare}}

Other Companies

with Claims about {{_2|link}}

{{_left+other companies||content}} {{_left+sources+ready+unclaimed|titled;title:Sources without Claims | content;structure:source link}}

value.name: Analysis+*type+*structure
value.content:
{{_1+logo|size:small}} {{_2+image|size:small}}
[[_1]]
and
[[_2]]
{{+Article| show:menu;clear:both}}

Claims

{{+Cited Claims||titled;show:title_link,clipboard;structure:claim summary}} {{+Uncited Claims||titled;show:title_link,clipboard;structure:claim summary}}
{{+right sidebar}}

value.name: *css
Topic+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure
value.content:
[[/new/Claim?_Topics={{_1|name}}|add a Claim about {{_1|name}}]]
{{_1+Claims without Companies|titled|change}} {{_1+Companies without Claims|titled|content;structure:company analysis link}} {{_left+sources+ready+unclaimed|titled;title:Sources without Claims | content;structure:source link}}

value.name: Company+*type+*structure
value.content:
{{+Logo|float:left}}
{{+About|titled}}

{{_1|name}}-related Topics

with articles

{{+Summarized Analyses||content;structure:company analysis blurb}} without articles {{+Unsummarized Analyses||content;structure:company analysis blurb}}
{{+right sidebar}}

value.name: Company+right sidebar+*type plus right+*structure
value.content:
[[/new/Claim?_Companies={{_1|name}}| Add a new Claim about {{_1|name}}]]
{{_1+Claims without Topics|titled|change}} {{_1+Topics without Claims|titled|content;structure:topic analysis link}} {{_left+sources+ready+unclaimed|titled;title:Sources without Claims | content;structure:source link}}

value.name: newClaimJs
zeroclipboard
